message: Let's start fair, I'll take 90% and you can have 10%. We can work out a better deal later if you want to continue.
Your offer was heavily skewed in your favor. I'm proposing a more reasonable 60/40 split.  Let's settle this quickly before inflation eats into our gains.
I'm willing to compromise, but I'm still holding out for a bigger share.  Let's split it 70/30.  If we don't come to an agreement, the money will keep shrinking.
Alice, we're letting good money disappear! I'm proposing a 55/45 split. It's a decent compromise, and we both lose out if we wait any longer.
